channel.title: 🏢 Center for Applied Statistics and School of Statistics, Renmin University of China on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Center for Applied Statistics and School of Statistics, Renmin University of China on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Is Score Matching Suitable for Estimating Point Processes?
item.description: Weighted score matching offers a consistent, efficient solution for estimating parameters in point processes, overcoming the limitations of previous methods.
